title: Global hotel chains set for record expansion in India
description: Radisson Hotel Group aims to reduce driving distances between its hotels in India, planning to have a property within every two hours of driving. Last year, they signed 21 new hotels, with plans to sign approximately 30 annually for the next five years. This period is expected to witness significant expansion by global chains like Marriott, Hilton, IHG, and Wyndham in India.
